body_html:
Ok, I was able to solve the problem, at least on my Windows 10:
This video finally helped me: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uIm3DMprk7M

Tensorflow 1.5.0 must be installed, to work with CUDA 9.0, you need to do this manually because almost every tutorial comes with commands that install the most recent version (1.7.0 for the moment).

Hope this helps!
body_text:

Hope this helps!
body:
Ok, I was able to solve the problem, at least on my Windows 10:
This video finally helped me: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uIm3DMprk7M

Tensorflow 1.5.0 must be installed, to work with CUDA 9.0, you need to do this manually because almost every tutorial comes with commands that install the most recent version (1.7.0 for the moment).

Hope this helps!
